hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I've been made redundant elmhurst pharmacy inc flushing ny Last week the U.S. government, through the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission, sued retailer Dollar General Corp. and car manufacturer BMW AG, for discriminating against African-Americans because both companies used criminal background checks as a tool for employee screening. As blacks are incarcerated at nearly six times the rate of whites, they're disproportionately affected by this type of screening.
